                                               java.util.ArrayList<GameCharacter> all_chrs,
                                               boolean clear,
                                               boolean spaced)
        Gets a printable ready map
        Parameters:
        map - Current game map of the game to be printed
        all_chrs - All characters of the game to be printed
        clear - Whether to clear the console or not
        spaced - Whether the return string has spaces between map tiles
        Returns:
        String with printable map
